allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: MyVMK Snowball Dashboard

Features:
- Build script with BFS team inference and conflict detection
- Team assignments propagated from seeded teams.json via attacker/victim graph
- Confidence scoring based on edge evidence
- Conflict detection output \(team_conflicts.json\)

Dashboard features:
- User table with search, team filter, sortable columns
- Scatter plot \(attacks vs hits taken\) colored by team
- Trend lines \(overall + per-team linear regression\)
- Interactive highlighting with stats panel
- Dual-axis rooms chart \(hits + avg user ratio\)
- Team stats summary cards
EOF
\)")
